title: Samurai Spirits: Shimabara Amakusa Jashinjou Kouryaku-hen
original_name: SAMURAI SPIRITS 島原天草邪神城攻略編
sinopse: Set in the year 1637, the story is focused on Haohmaru and his samurai entourage called the "Sword Saints," on the onset of the Shimabara Rebellion, as they fight and tear their way through the Dark God's army in epic confrontations and awe-inducing battles!
